articles.description: In April, METALLICA launched its inaugural "For Whom The Band Tolls" marching band competition. METALLICA challenged marching bands at all levels to craft the most exciting, unique, and impressive performances of the legendary heavy metal act's music. METALLI…

articles.title: Inside Kylie Jenner and Timothée Chalamet’s “Cozy” Date Night at Wonka Premiere - E! NEWS
articles.description: Kylie Jenner and her mom Kris Jenner were front and center in support of Timothée Chalamet’s Wonka movie premiere in Los Angeles. Get the exclusive details on their date night.
